definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

pinyin: zhou1 ji4 dan4 dao4 dao3 dan4

sentences.english: Based on the six-freedom-degree ballistic equations, the model of air to ground submunition in the terminal guidance stage was established.
sentences.chinese: 利用六自由度動力學模型對末段彈道進行了仿真。

sentences.english: We're talking military grade, for multi-megaton ballistic weaponry.
sentences.chinese: 按我們所講的軍事等級，那屬於熱核彈道武器。

sentences.english: India has successfully launched a long-range intercontinental ballistic missile able to carry a nuclear warhead, officials say.
sentences.chinese: 印度成功發射一枚可以攜帶核彈頭的洲際彈道導彈。

sentences.english: Outer material is made from Tumi's signature ballistic nylon.
sentences.chinese: 荼靡的簽名彈道尼龍材料是由外。

sentences.english: Xiao Ming is suddenly obsessed with weapons, he is especially interested in anti-ballistic missiles.
sentences.chinese: 小明忽然成了兵器迷，尤其對反彈道導彈很有興趣。

sentences.english: A generation ago, President Reagan proposed research intoa global shield to defend against ballistic missiles.
sentences.chinese: 一代人之前，里根總統提議研究彈道導彈防禦系統。

sentences.english: Both ballistic and maneuvering re-entries are considered.
sentences.chinese: 考慮了彈道式再入和機動再入兩種情況。

sentences.english: Sometimes allowance for the curvature of the trajectory was made by "sighting by the line of metal."
sentences.chinese: 有時會以“炮身瞄準“方式來補償不平直的彈道。

sentences.english: A growth shell exterior ballistic model is established according to the hypotheses and the characteristics of sufferance force.
sentences.chinese: 根據假設和受力分析，建立了錨彈的外彈道模型。

sentences.english: Equally important to the ballistic range tests is the design of model and sabot .
sentences.chinese: 模型及彈託設計是開展彈道靶試驗研究的基礎。

sentences.english: The whole ballistic electromagnetic environment is very important for the design of fuzes, especially for that of electrical fuzes.
sentences.chinese: 全彈道電磁環境對引信特別是電引信的設計非常重要。

sentences.english: It is presented an effective approach for computing the basic firing data of missiles.
sentences.chinese: 實現了一種基於攝動制導的彈道導彈的發射諸元算法。

sentences.english: A ballistics expert were taking evidence at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 一位彈道學家正在犯法現場提取證據。

sentences.english: Conventional TBMs were not judged cost-effective for battlefield use.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的戰術彈道導彈在戰場使用上的效率比並不合算。

sentences.english: It is of great significance to investigate the ballistic target space counter-recognition.
sentences.chinese: 彈道目標空間反識別技術的研究具有重要意義。

sentences.english: A group of complex differential equations must be solved for the ballistic calculation of air-to-air missile.
sentences.chinese: 空空導彈彈道計算需要解算一組複雜的微分方程。
